name: Oblivion Override
description:
Raw, Fast-Paced, Hardcore Side-Scrolling Action
Oblivion Override is a raw and fast-paced action game that offers challenging gameplay. Break free from the constraints of conventional systems and unleash your combat prowess.


23+ Unique Melee Weapons
Discover a vast arsenal of 23+ distinctive melee weapons, each with its own style, movesets, and traits. Untame your imagination as you experiment with a diverse range of combat styles!




2 Mighty Machines, 3 Exclusive Abilities
Take control of 2 powerful combat machines, each equipped with 3 exclusive abilities. These abilities serve as the foundation for specialized builds, allowing you to adapt and evolve your own playstyle whenever, wherever.



Explore War-Torn Underground Wastelands
As robots became self-aware, they ventured fearlessly into the desolate expanse of the Dulce Base in pursuit of uncovering the mysteries behind the Oblivion Code. Yet these daring hackers all vanished without a trace, swallowed by the abyss of silence…
